text:
[Verse]
Woke up to the sunshine
Brighter than in my dreams
Eyes wide and the world's mine
Life's sweeter than it seems

[Verse]
Walking down the street now
Every step feels so light
With you by my side now
Everything feels just right

[Chorus]
Sunshine all around me
Feeling so alive
Sunshine lifts me up so
Heart begins to thrive

[Verse]
Colors seem much clearer
Smiles all around
Laughs a little louder
Joy is what I found

[Chorus]
Sunshine all around me
Feeling so alive
Sunshine lifts me up so
Heart begins to thrive

[Bridge]
No more rainy days here
Only light and love
With every moment near
I'm flying high above
title: Sunshine Delight
